page.title: 07SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: THE CENTRE HOUSES A SWIMMING POOL,USED BY THE PUBLIC,VARIOUS CLUBS,AND LOCAL SCHOOLS.THERE IS A LARGE SPORTS HALL WHICH IS USED FOR BADMINTON, FIVE-A-SIDE FOOTBALL,BASKETBALL,AND OTHER FUNCTIONS SUCH AS CONCERTS AND WRESTLING.THERE IS A SMALLER SPORTS HALL,THE RANDALL ROOM,WHICH IS USED FOR GYMNASTICS, YOGA,AND OLD TIME DANCING.THE CENTRE HAS TWO SQUASH COURTS AND HAS A THRIVING SQUASH CLUB.ATTACHED TO THE SPORTS CENTRE BUILDING IS THE RETFORD-ORDSALL YOUTH CLUB WHICH IS USED BY THE LOCAL CHILDREN.OF ALL THE CENTRES FACILTIES SWIMMING IS THE MOST POPULAR IN TERMS OF NUMBERS OF PEOPLE USING THE CENTRE.
